attributes.action: reverse the decision to grant Salman Rushdie a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I don't really care that a vocal minority of Muslims object to the Knighthood, although it was IMHO as exceptionally crass action to announce such an honour at the moment with the wars in Iraq and Afganhistan on-going. 

My major concern is that IMHO Salman Rushdie has done little or nothing to deserve any such honour. The Satanic Verses is dreadful nonsense published mainly because they knew it would offend and therefore generate publicity and sales. His remaining works are few and of little literary value. 

All he's done over the last few years is hide at the tax payers expense because of a row he caused by crass idiocy and greed.

I see no reason to knight him, although I admitt the idea of the Queen waving a sword near his throat is appealing!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
